name: Repeal Clicker
description:
Repeal Clicker is a short clicker game made as part of #RepealJam.
We're hoping  to encourage people to have those small interactions, the short conversations and maybe even go out canvassing in the last few days in the run up to the referendum to Repeal the 8th. 
Every chat, every badge, every little thing you do helps the people of Ireland in finally repealing this amendment that has punished pregnant people for too long.
Join us as together we #repealth8th

Enjoy! 

Created by:

Jen Carey @JenuinePanic

Andrew Hynes @HynesSight_2020

Emmet O' Toole @Emmmet

Dónall O'Donoghue @Donall

Basil Lim @firewatersun
